00036 
00037 MultiTrack* Spatializer::spatialize(Track& t, int numTracks)
00038 {
00039 
00040 
00041     Track* scaledTrack = new Track(t);
00042     scaledTrack->scale( 1.0/float(numTracks) );
00043     
00044     // create a new multitrack:
00045     MultiTrack* mt = new MultiTrack;
00046     
00047     // add copies of the scaled track to this multitrack
00048     for (int i=0; i<numTracks; i++)
00049     {
00050         mt->add( new Track(*scaledTrack) );
00051     }
00052     
00053     // delete the scaled track
00054     delete scaledTrack;
00055     
00056     // return:
00057     return mt;
00058 }
00059 
00060 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00061 Spatializer* Spatializer::clone()
00062 {
00063     return new Spatializer(*this);
00064 }
00065 
00066 void Spatializer::xml_print( ofstream& xmlOutput )
00067 {
00068         xmlOutput << "\t\t<spatializer>" << endl;
00069         
00070         xmlOutput << "\t\t</spatializer>" << endl;
00071 }
